des: "I love the rich flavor of dark chocolate hot fudge sauce. My favorite is GuittardÂ®; however, Hershey'sÂ® Dark Chocolate is delicious too."
ins: Place sweetened condensed milk into a saucepan with semisweet and dark chocolate and butter over medium-low heat. Melt chocolate and butter, stirring constantly, until the sauce is smooth; stir in vanilla extract. Serve warm.
